message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive price. I believe it's a fair deal considering the product's worth to you and its market value.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $12,000 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  This is a fair price considering my maximum budget and the value I place on the product. I'm confident this is a win-win for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a compromise. I am willing to sell the product for $9,500. This price reflects the value of the product to you and allows me to achieve a satisfactory return on my investment.
